parties.party_name: CHAUDRY M. A. CHAUDRY MUHAMMED AKHTAR VIRK

charges.charge_description: On or about 5/27/01, in Franklin County, in the Northern District of New York defendant Virk did, knowingly and willfully enter the United States at a time and place other than that designated by Immigration Officials and eluded examination or inspection by a U.S. Immigration Officer; To wit that on or about 5/27/01, the deft. entered the U.s. at a point appx. 2 miles east of the Prot of entry at Massena, New York by crossing the St. Lawrence River, in Violation of Title 8,USC 1325
